content: started as a cal on stylecraft in september 2019 aiming for all clues to be out by the end of the year clues released every other tuesday first on 3 september the last on 26th november yardage unknown as yet 4000yds is the total of all the balls but it will depend on gauge three colour variations available sunstar - original colours using stylecraft life and stylecraft batik my vintage - greens reds and yellow uses batik batik elements and life my country garden - cheaper version using more purples pinks and greens uses stylecraft special dk only pattern tips and videos can be found on the stylecraft cal group on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/2814982615184370/
